mapper.insert: insert into sys_role ( id, app_id, base_id_str, role_name, role_key, role_sort, data_scope, menu_check_strictly, dept_check_strictly, status, menu_ids, dept_ids ) values ( #{sysRole.id, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sysRole.appId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sysRole.baseIdStr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysRole.roleName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysRole.roleKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysRole.roleSort, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysRole.dataScope, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysRole.menuCheckStrictly, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysRole.deptCheckStrictly, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sysRole.status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysRole.menuIds, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysRole.deptIds, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
